segments.text: Then , Mary . We need 10 more loose-leaf binders , five pounds of heavy duty white paper , and what else did I say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two boxes of transparencies for the over-head machines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . And I ’ d like one of those new electric pencil sharpeners .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Mr . Jones . Do you think we ’ ll need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2
